mapper.select: SELECT purchase_items.serial_number, purchase_supply.supplier, purchase_supply.brand, purchase_supply.model, purchase_items.item, purchase_items.unit, purchase_supply.number, purchase_supply.price, purchase_supply.total_price, purchase_supply.params supply_params, purchase_items.params items_params, purchase_supply.warranty, purchase_supply.remark FROM purchase_project inner join purchase_items inner join purchase_supply on purchase_items.project_id = purchase_project.id and purchase_items.id = purchase_supply.item_id where purchase_project.is_active = 1 and purchase_items.is_active = 1 and purchase_supply.is_active=1 and purchase_project.id=#{projectId,jdbcType = BIGINT} order by purchase_supply.supplier
select count(contract_no) from purchase_contract where contract_no=#{contractNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
